item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.

My research group study the dynamics and impacts of the Earthâ€™s crustal processes due to natural forces and human activities from societal to geological timescales. These phenomena include microseismicity, large earthquakes, tsunamis, fault creep, ground uplift and subsidence in diverse environments such as geothermal fields, crustal faults, and subduction zones. We address various geoscience problems using geodetic imaging (e.g., Global Navigation Satellite Systems & Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar; GNSS/InSAR), seismological observations (e.
